Util

Class io

  • java.lang.Object
    • Util.io

  • public class io
extends java.lang.Object
    The Util.io class provides static IO functions, used for outputting automata to console or files.
    Author:
    Cindy Yue Ben

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      io() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void printPA2console(CreateHPA g, java.lang.String message)
      Print out a whole CreateHPA to console.
      static void writeCreateHPA2FAT(CreateHPA g, java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String comment)
      Output the CreateHPA to file in FAT tool format.
      static void writeCreateHPA2file(CreateHPA g, java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String comment)
      Output the whole CreateHPA into a plain file, for record/debugging use only.
      static void writeCreateHPA2HPA(CreateHPA g, java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String comment)
      Output CreateHPA to standard HPA tool formatted file, ready as input for HPA Verification.
      static void writeHPA2file(PA g, java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String comment)
      Output the whole PA to plain file.
      static void writePA2FAT(PA g, java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String comment)
      Write the PA to file, in FAT tool format.
      static void writePA2HPA(PA g, java.io.File file, java.lang.String comment)
      Write the PA to file, in standard HPA format.

        comment - Will be written as comment in output file.
